text: Lets just cut to the chase. What do you need us to do?
Oh you misunderstand children. I called you all here to help you.
Think of it as repayment for your assistance with the millipede incident last week.
You see with my resources, I can make these little adventures y'all keep having a bit easier for you. Or make them even more dangerous if that's your thing. And that's just the start.
You'd be amazed the problems you can solve with a little bribin' money.
